title: Memori Expands Into a Full-Scale Memory Layer for AI Agents Across SQL and MongoDB
description: Memori is an innovative, open-source memory system that empowers AI agents with structured, long-term memory using standard databases like SQL and MongoDB. It seamlessly integrates into existing frameworks, enabling efficient data extraction and retrieval wit…
content: Memori has matured into a full-featured, open-source memory system designed to give AI agents long-term, structured, and queryable memory using standard databases rather than proprietary vector store… [+2687 chars]
